summary: This code is running vspipe, a command-line tool for processing video files with VapourSynth script. It takes a .vpy script file as input and uses the -c flag for y4m format output.

details.comment: This code is running vspipe, a command-line tool for processing video files with VapourSynth script. It takes a .vpy script file as input and uses the -c flag for y4m format output.
